body.p: James Brown being in custody charged with the offense of Horse Stealing and being admitted to Bail in the Sum of Five Hundred Dollars, Now we John H Hazelrigg and D K Brown undertake that the Said James Brown will make his personal appearance in the Morgan Circut Court on the First day of its next Term to answer Said Charge and will at all times render himself amenable to the Orders and process of said Court in the prosecution of Said Charge and if Convicted will render himself in execution therof or if he fails to perform either of these conditions we will pay to the Commonwealth of Kentucky the Sum of Five Hundred Dollars Dec 8th 1865

Atteste
J B Fugett J P M C
